Package org.unibl.etf.epj2.reports

Class Bill

java.lang.Object
org.unibl.etf.epj2.reports.Bill
public class Bill extends Object
Represents a bill for a vehicle rental.

The Bill class encapsulates all relevant details about a rental transaction, including the rental date and time, driver information, vehicle details, location, usage duration and pricing information. It also includes data about malfunctions, promotions and discounts applied during the rental.

Author:
Tamara Kosovac

  • Constructor Details

    • Bill

      public Bill(String rentalDateTime, String nameOfTheDriver, String idOfVehicle, int unitPrice, String startLocation, String finishLocation, int usageDurationInSeconds, String hasMalfunction, String hasPromotion, double discount, double discountProm, double totalPrice, String inNarrowCity)
      Constructs a new Bill with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      rentalDateTime - The date and time of the rental.
      nameOfTheDriver - The name of the driver.
      idOfVehicle - The ID of the vehicle.
      unitPrice - The price per unit.
      startLocation - The starting location of the rental.
      finishLocation - The finishing location of the rental.
      usageDurationInSeconds - The duration of the rental in seconds.
      hasMalfunction - Indicates if there was a malfunction during the rental.
      hasPromotion - Indicates if a promotion was applied.
      discount - The amount of discount applied.
      discountProm - The amount of promotional discount applied.
      totalPrice - The total price of the rental.
      inNarrowCity - Indicates if the rental was in a narrow city area.
